name: World of Warships: Legends — Gunfighters
description:
Engage in epic gun duels with battleship Nassau and cruiser Budyonny! In this pack, you'll get these two ships with their permanent camos, plus a week of Premium Account! These ships will help you charge into battle in World of Warships: Legends.

This bundle contains: - Tier III battleship Nassau - Halloween permanent camouflage for Nassau - Tier V cruiser Budyonny - Permanent camouflage for Budyonny - 7 days of Premium Account

If you already have any of these ships and camouflages, you'll receive the following compensation: Budyonny: 4,087,500 credits Budyonny camouflage: 6,000,000 credits Nassau: 5,625,000 credits

Content such as boosters, Commander XP, camouflages, etc., are only visible upon reaching a specific account level in the game.
